channel.description: Located at 819 Buford Road in Richmond, VA USA, and shepherded by Dr. Tony Kohout, senior pastor.
channel.itunes:summary: Buford Road Baptist Church is a community of believers who are committed and dedicated to sharing the gospel of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.
